name: AskMeFast
overview: Askmefast.com allows a user to search for a question and answer on a topic of their choice. The user can answer questions and build their reputation with the online askmefast.com community.

milestones.description: Askmefast allows users who do not find the answer they are looking for to get an live instant answer from a community expert.  This means users have double the chance of finding the answer they need.  Instant answers are done via chat with a community exp

Ask Me Fast / askmefast.com has taken extra steps to prevent comment spam and answer spam.   Answers and comments are closely reviewed to ensure product promotion is not the main focus of the answer although it is ok for a vendor to post their product if

Askmefast.com is now working on improving email deliverability.  We will either be using sendgrid or splitting the mail messages up and sending different types of notifications like new answer or new comment notifications via different domains.  It is unc
askmefast.com is hiring new content managers to better improve content quality.  They will be tasked with reviewing all new questions answers and comments daily and removing unwanted content.

AskeMeFast changes it's question page format to better highlight the question and question details sections.  Over the next few weeks expect some changes askmefast.com modifies the new format base on user feedback.
Askmefast.com has launched it's new uk version at uk.askmefast.com to better serve the United Kingdom.
Askmefast is embarking on an initiative to increase the sociability of questions and answers by moving more towards relationships to provide a context for better answers.

AskMeFast is hiring!  We are looking for brainiacs to serve as experts on our website.  Although we are have positions available in several topic areas, we are particularly looking for individuals who understand cell phone problems and can help our users
AskMeFast.com is expanding it's expert base to include not just experts, but chat operators, researchers, and content managers.
